summary:
**Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (TMNT)** is a popular media series about four ninja turtle brothers: Leonardo, Donatello, Raphael, and Michelangelo. Created by Kevin Eastman and Peter Laird in 1984, it started as a comic book parodying superhero comics. The turtles fight evil in New York City using their ninjutsu skills.

The franchise includes comics, TV shows, movies, video games, and toys. It became very successful, with billions of dollars in toy sales and popular TV shows and movies. The rights were sold to Viacom (now Paramount Global) in 2009, and new TMNT content is still being made.
title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
